text: Bhiwani Vidhan Sabha constituency () is one of the 90 Vidhan Sabha constituencies in Haryana state in northern India. ==Overview== Bhiwani (constituency number 57) is one of the 6 Vidhan Sabha constituencies located in Bhiwani district. This constituency covers the entire Bhiwani town and neighbouring villages . Bhiwani is part of Bhiwani-Mahendragarh Lok Sabha constituency along with eight other Vidhan Sabha segments, namely, Dadri, Badhra, Tosham and Loharu in this district and Ateli, Mahendragarh, Narnaul and Nangal Chaudhry in Mahendragarh district. ==Members of Legislative Assembly== *1967: B. Dev, Bharatiya Jana Sangh *1972: Banarsi Das Gupta, Indian National Congress *1977: Bir Singh, Janta Party *1982: Sagar Ram Gupta, Indian National Congress *1987: Banarsi Das Gupta, Lok Dal *1991: Ram Bhajan Aggrawal, Haryana Vikas Party *1996: Ram Bhajan Aggrawal, Haryana Vikas Party *2000: Bansi Lal, Haryana Vikas Party *2005: Shiv Shankar Bhrdwaj, Indian National Congress *2009: Ghanshyam Saraf, Bhartiya Janta Party *2014: Ghanshyam Saraf, Bhartiya Janta Party *2019: Ghanshyam Saraf, Bhartiya Janta Party ==See also== * Bhiwani ==References== Category:Assembly constituencies of Haryana Category:Bhiwani district
title: Bhiwani (Vidhan Sabha constituency)
